title: Equitas Small Finance Bank's shares tank over 10% as Street reacts to MD, CEO PN Vasudevan's resignation - CNBCTV18
content: Equitas Small Finance Bank's shares tank over 10% as Street reacts to MD, CEO PN Vasudevan's resignation  CNBCTV18
description: The board would be forming a search committee shortly to undertake the process of identifying a successor. Vasudevan would continue as the MD and CEO till the succession and transition process is completed, it said.
